attributes.action: People who refuse the Covid-19 vaccine should’t be allowed to go anywhere
attributes.additional_details: Our only way out of this pandemic is if everyone who is who is offered the covid-19 vaccine gets vaccinated. This is the only way we can go back to normality.
attributes.background: The goverment should make a rule where if a person refuses the covid-19 vaccine, shouldn’t be allowed in crowed public places e.g - Cinema’s, Restuarants, Theme Parks, Pubs, Places of Worship, Airports ect.. they shouldn’t be allowed in travel out of the UK either.
